sentences.en: a help group for compulsive overeaters
sentences.cn: 帮助强迫性暴饮暴食者的团体

sentences.en: Compulsive drinking is bad for one's health.
sentences.cn: 不加节制的饮酒有害健康.

sentences.en: He gave the boy a compulsive push.
sentences.cn: 他给那男孩强迫的一推.

sentences.en: He was a compulsive gambler and often heavily in debt.
sentences.cn: 他嗜赌成癖，常常债台高筑。

sentences.en: He went to a psychiatrist about his compulsive gambling.
sentences.cn: 他去看精神科医生治疗不能自拔的赌瘾.

sentences.en: He's a compulsive liar , ie He lies repeatedly.
I can't lose myself in this obsessive - compulsive irrational behavior.
sentences.cn: 我不能再把自己遗失在这 - 失去理性的行为.

sentences.en: Most compulsive gamblers are not successful.
sentences.cn: 多数嗜赌成瘾的赌徒都常赌输.

sentences.en: Nail biting or picking has also been linked to obsessive - compulsive disorder.
sentences.cn: 钉咬或采摘亦已连结强迫症.

sentences.en: Once the compulsive spender stops at the mall, she will be unable to control her spending.
sentences.cn: 患强迫性购物症的人一旦来到购物中心，就无法控制自己的开支。

sentences.en: Personality disorder disorders, like obsessive compulsive disorder , came next.
sentences.cn: 接下来就是性格紊乱, 诸如强迫症.

sentences.en: Personality disorders by apersasive compasave disorders, like obsessive compulsive disorder , came next.
sentences.cn: 其次是人格方面的精神障碍, 例如妄想强迫症.

sentences.en: She eats in secret like most compulsive overeaters.
sentences.cn: 她像大多数强迫性暴食者那样偷偷地吃东西。

sentences.en: The BBC series Hot Chefs is compulsive viewing.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司的系列节目“当红厨师”是个让人一看就上瘾的节目。
他们的故事读起来有趣极了.

sentences.en: These chilling heroines make Hart's books compulsive reading.
sentences.cn: 这些令人毛骨悚然的女主人公使哈特的书读起来让人爱不释手。

words.tran_cn: 义务的；必修的；被强制的
（花样滑冰、竞技体操等的）规定动作

trans.tran_cn: 极有趣的，令人着迷的，因着迷而引起的，强迫性的
